text: The Toyota Avalon is a car made by Toyota. It is a full-size car with four doors. The car was first introduced as a 1995 model. It has sold over 1 million copies since it was introduced.December 2015 and Year-End Sales Chart"(Press release). US: Toyota. 2016-01-05. Retrieved 2016-01-18.As of 2013, the Toyota Avalon is available in the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico, Russia, South Korea, and the Middle East. The car is named after Avalon, a legendary island from Celtic legends. In 2022, the car stopped being sold in the United States. ==References== Avalon Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: Toyota Avalon
